history.string: add policy IMS_Document
mod policy IMS_Document description 'For ims document'
mod policy IMS_Document add type IMS_Document
mod policy IMS_Document add type IMS_DocumentSet
mod policy IMS_Document add format generic
mod policy IMS_Document defaultformat generic
mod policy IMS_Document sequence 00,01,02,...
mod policy IMS_Document store STORE
mod policy IMS_Document add allstate public none none owner none none

mod policy IMS_Document allstate revoke public none none filter '' remove revoke public all all revoke owner none none filter '' remove revoke owner all all public none none filter '' remove public all all owner none none filter '' remove owner all all
mod policy IMS_Document allstate user IMS_Admin all all
mod policy IMS_Document add state Published public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document add state PreReviewed public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document add state Declined public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document add state Reviewed public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document add state PreApproved public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document add state Approved public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined version true
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined published false
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined public fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined user IMS_ContractorApprover checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined user IMS_ContractorUser checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input PolicyIMSDocumentPromotePreReviewAction
mod policy IMS_Document state Declined signature ToPreReviewed branch PreReviewed filter ''
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed version false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed published false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed public fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed user IMS_OwnerApprover fromconnect fromconnect,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed user IMS_OwnerUser fromconnect fromconnect,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed user IMS_RS_DocCoordinator checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,modifyform,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed user IMS_RS_Reviewers checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,modifyform,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed add trigger demote action emxTriggerManager input PolicyIMSDocumentPromoteDeclinedAction
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input PolicyIMSDocumentPromoteReviewedAction
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed signature ToDeclined branch Declined filter 'attribute[IMS_CreateIssueForDoc] == "yes"'
mod policy IMS_Document state PreReviewed signature ToReviewed branch Reviewed filter 'attribute[IMS_CreateIssueForDoc] == "no"'
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved version false
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved published false
mod policy IMS_Document state Approved public fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Published !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state Published promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state Published checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state Published version true
mod policy IMS_Document state Published action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Published check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Published majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state Published minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state Published published false
mod policy IMS_Document state Published user IMS_Contractor read read,show
mod policy IMS_Document state Published user IMS_ContractorApprover fromconnect fromconnect,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Published user IMS_ContractorUser all all
mod policy IMS_Document state Published add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input PolicyIMSDocumentPromotePreReviewAction
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed version true
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed published false
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed public fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed user IMS_ContractorApprover checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state Reviewed user IMS_ContractorUser checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved promote false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved version false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved published false
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved public fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved user IMS_OwnerApprover fromconnect fromconnect,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved user IMS_OwnerUser fromconnect fromconnect,promote,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_Document state PreApproved add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input PolicyIMSDocumentPromoteApporvedAction
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_Declined value Declined
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_PreReviewed value PreReviewed
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_Approved value Approved
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_Published value Published
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_Reviewed value Reviewed
mod policy IMS_Document add property state_PreApproved value PreApproved
mod policy IMS_Document add property 'MxUpdate Sub Path'
mod policy IMS_Document add property application value Unknown
mod policy IMS_Document add property author value 'The MxUpdate Team'
mod policy IMS_Document add property 'file date' value '07-08-2019 08:55:19.763'
mod policy IMS_Document add property 'installed date' value 07-10-2019
mod policy IMS_Document add property installer value 'The MxUpdate Team'
mod policy IMS_Document add property 'original name' value IMS_Document
mod policy IMS_Document add property version

modify policy 'IMS_Document' state 'Published' state 'PreReviewed' signature 'ToReviewed' add filter 'attribute[IMS_CreateIssueForDoc] == "no"' signature 'ToDeclined' add filter 'attribute[IMS_CreateIssueForDoc] == "yes"';
